name: Novotel London Paddington

reviews.text: Arrived at hotel after flight from Australia. For 2 adults and 2 children it is definitely snug - esp with the sofa bed pulled out. The sofa was a surprise. Instead of being a soggy double, it was 2 full sized single beds. Great for the kids and stopped the squabbling.
reviews.title: Great for a night in London ( or longer )

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in easy - we'd booked a B&B package on the net. Quiet sleep, and reasonable buffet breakfast the next morning.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: Free internet access in the foyer. Short stroll to Paddington Station, Sainsburys local, countless bus routes into the heart of London. Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Never again
New style Novotel in "new" area
reviews.text: Hotel is located within walking distance of Paddington Station where the Heathrow Express ends. Just walk to the end of platform 8 and you see the Hotel within 5 minutes.

reviews.title: Location, location, location
reviews.text: Rooms are nices and fairly spacious. The windows are very soundproof so you don't get any trafic noises etc. Not all taxis can find the hotel but just tell them it's at Paddington Central.

I was in London for a week visiting with friends and needed a place to stay. The Novotel was an easy walk to Paddington station which had several tube lines to choose from. It also made travel to the airport easy with the Heathrow Express train.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I did not find the front desk staff overly friendly, but they did attend to any questions or requests I had promptly. I wasn't there to make friends with the staff. I found the bar/restaurant staff quite friendly, particularly in the morning when going for the buffet.
reviews.title: Great location in a quiet area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was nice and modern. I was offered the choice of a room with a tub when I checked in, but declined. I loved the style of the shower/sink. The toilet was in a separate room, but that did not bother me at all as it seems to be somewhat common in the UK.
reviews.title: Very Good

reviews.text: I loved the overall style and feel of the hotel. Everyone was very professional. My room was always very neat and tidy when I returned at the end of the day.
reviews.title: Great hotel, close to the station and nice facilities

reviews.text: I had no trouble finding the hotel from the station, once you head out the exit by platform 8 there are signs right there. It felt like a very safe area at night with the security staff on site.
reviews.title: Average Hotel - Poor Service
A good compromise
reviews.text: Stayed here for 4 nights in late Sept 09.

reviews.title: Perfect spot but hard to find
reviews.text: A good compromise of location, comfort, convienienvce and cost.

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.text: Location/convienience - 5 minute walk to Paddington Tube and Railway stations. Get from here to anywhere in central London in under 30 minutes on the tube. Get from here to Heathrow in less than 30 minutes on the Heathrow Express.

reviews.title: Excellent value for money hotel
reviews.text: Comfort - a new and well equipped hotel - comfortable, extremely quiet room and good modern bathroom. Located in a new business development precinct with taxi access but no other vehicle traffic.

reviews.title: Its Ok for a quick stay.
reviews.text: Cost - Booked online and spent an average of 140 pounds a night for superior room and breakfast. Pretty reasonable for London.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent hotel with a magnificent location (5 to 7 minutes from Paddington). Short stay but a excelent quality hotel. Would unhesitatingly back
reviews.title: Marvelous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent 5 nts. @ Novotel Paddington. Room was nice size for London & the included breakfast was a generous buffet of eggs, meats, cheeses, fruits & cereals. Staff were courteous & helpful.
reviews.title: CONVENIENT & FRIENDLY

reviews.text: We booked directly with Accor chain [1st timers] and got a great rate in advance of 99gpb per night +tx. The hotel is a quick 7 minute walk from Paddington RR Station, where we were able to connect to LHR via train,....pick up tube & buses for anywhere in London we wanted to go......and even availed ourselves of Tour Bus pickups daily outside the Hilton Paddington above the RR Station.....very convenient !
reviews.title: New hotel in Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only had 2 days in London so Paddington was the ideal choice as the Heathrow Express and Heathrow connect (extra 5-10 minutes but half the price of the Express) finish there.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel that lacks hospitality...

reviews.text: The hotel emailed the location map a couple of days before our arrival so it was easy to find (once we found that the end of platform 8 is really at the other end of platform 8). It is about 5-8 minute walk to the hotel from the station. If I you are a single female traveller arriving after dark I probably recommend taking a taxi to the hotel from the front of the station as you need to walk out to the back of the station and along the canal in a very lonely area.
reviews.title: Wonderful staff; fantastic service; great experience for families for short stays

description: The 4 star Novotel London Paddington is in the Paddington Central area, easily accessible by public transport and a few minutes' walk from Paddington Station (15 minute link to Heathrow Airport and great connection to all parts of London with 4 tube lines). Enjoy a shopping spree on Oxford Street or take a leisurely stroll to Hyde Park and Kensington Palace. All 206 rooms have free Wifi access and satellite TV. Our Elements restaurant and bar also offer a relaxed dining and drinking experience. The hotel has a swimming pool, sauna and fitness room for you to unwind after a long day exploring London. You can as well use our concierge services to book your tickets for the best West End shows or for numerous attractions.
